name: Sticky Friends
description:
Sticky Friends is a small puzzle game.
Your goal is to move around and wake all your asleep friends up. However, when a friend is awaken, it starts sticking to you, maybe blocking your way to the other ones. Try to stick to them in the right order, from the right side, to win this game !

Controls :
- Desktop : arrow keys to move, R to restart, Esc for menu, use mouse in menus
- Mobile : slide finger to move
